summary:
This mod replaces themes played while fighting dragons in game (except the one used during character generation, which I thought I should leave untouched).
It comes in two different versions: rock and epic one, differences between those two should be obvious.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]================================================
Dragon Fighting Music Replacer
================================================[/size][/center]

[color=lime]================================================
Description
================================================[/color]

This mod replaces themes played while fighting dragons in game 
(except the one used during character generation, which I thought I should leave untouched).

It comes in two different versions: rock and epic one, differences between those two should be obvious.
Currently, without CK, I cannot use more types than three, or define which type will be played while fighting specific type of dragon.

Additional dragon\'s soul absorbing music is provided, if the base one does not compose well with new music 
(I think it doesn\'t with the rock version) in your opinion.
I used the fx from Aura Whisper shout for that.

[color=lime]================================================
Installation/Uninstallation
================================================[/color]

Just copy files provided in the folder of version you want to your own data folder
(should be something like \"<steam_directory>\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\").

To Uninstall, simply remove the files you have copied.

[color=lime]================================================
Compatibility
================================================[/color]

Should be compatibile with any mods except, of course, those changing the same files as mine.

[color=lime]================================================
Known Issues
================================================[/color]

Currently none.

[color=lime]================================================
Credits
================================================[/color]

Songs used in the epic version:

theme 1 -> Epic Score: Tip of the Spear 
theme 2 -> Epic Score: Unstoppable Forces
theme 3 -> Epic Score: Hell\'s Army

Songs used in the rock version:

theme 1 -> Elena Huston: Future In My Hands
theme 2 -> Finger Eleven: Living In A Dream
theme 3 -> Rise Against: Rumors of my demise have been greatly exaggerated

[color=lime]================================================[/color]

Enjoy!
 JohnB
author: JohnB

files.name: Dragon Fighting Music Replacer - optional soul absorb replacer
